column5: You’ll love my place because: - It has easy access to the airport, downtown, the Riverwalk, the AT&T Center (Spurs), Morgan’s Wonderland, JW Marriott Hill Country Resort, SAMMC, The Quarry, Top Golf, city parks, and much more. - Public transportation is less than a mile away. - Grocery store, restaurants, and shopping are only a mile away. - It backs up to the greenbelt.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and small families.
